columns.name: flow_log_id
columns.description: The ID of the flow log.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The date and time the flow log was created.

columns.name: deliver_logs_error_message
columns.description: Information about the error that occurred.

columns.name: deliver_logs_permission_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the IAM role that posts logs to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: deliver_logs_status
columns.description: The status of the logs delivery (SUCCESS | FAILED).

columns.name: flow_log_status
columns.description: The status of the flow log (ACTIVE).

columns.name: log_group_name
columns.description: The name of the flow log group.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC, subnet, or network interface.

columns.name: traffic_type
columns.description: The type of traffic. Valid values are: 'ACCEPT', 'REJECT',  'ALL'.

columns.name: log_destination_type
columns.description: Specifies the type of destination to which the flow log data is published.

columns.name: log_destination
columns.description: Specifies the destination to which the flow log data is published.

columns.name: bucket_name
columns.description: The name of the destination bucket to which the flow log data is published.

columns.name: log_format
columns.description: The format of the flow log record.

columns.name: max_aggregation_interval
columns.description: The maximum interval of time, in seconds, during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the VPC flowlog.
